title: Want to increase staff loyalty? You'll need to be seen as important, new research suggests

title_detail.value: Want to increase staff loyalty? You'll need to be seen as important, new research suggests

summary: Offering praise and having a good working relationship isn't always enough to engender loyalty from staff -- employees also need to feel that the relationship with their boss is important, according to new research.
